I have returned to CS:GO after a length 6 year break. I was pleasantly surprised to find that this game has not changed for the worst. Enjoying my time back, met a couple of friendly team mates. This of course the occasional toxic player but that comes with all competitive games.

one suggestion: make it so there are language specific match making filters. Its a lot easier to co-operate and work as a team when we can all understand each other.
